list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Render blocking avoided - CSS inlined on index html.
+1 point on accesibility - h5 replaced to a paragraph on print_news_function.php

task.summary: Delete feed button added - Fixed logo image not centered perfectly - Fixed returning empty JSON when database is empty - Some functions of feed.js renamed for better understanding - Fixed some typos
Added feed titles and size limit - Now news with no image shows default feed image - News image fixed at 200px x 200px size - Feed title shows up at top of page - News are now scrollable

New features - Now all news from all registered feeds appears when page loads. Some functions of feed.js was changed because of this - Category names of news displays at right of the news item - New loading animation when changing between feeds or updating - Removed general feed title. Now the title of the feed appears above item image. This is for better understanding when displaying all news from all feeds. - load.php renamed to read_db.php
Minor features - Now feed items without image shows a default image - Feed container now is scrollable

New features - Order working - Categories working - Refreshes working
- Several changes

Icon optimization - Icons now are CSS sprites
Images optimization - Images compressed - Logo is now stored locally and compressed (21 kb -> 3 kb plus faster load) - GIF loading image optimized
PHP optimization - Repetitive code (format & print news code) now is a function

Font optimizationts - Font fallback CSS added
SEO optimizationes - Meta description added
Script optimizations - Scripts inline HTML now have defer attribute

Render blocking avoided - CSS inlined on index html.
+1 point on accesibility - h5 replaced to a paragraph on print_news_function.php

Now the title of the feed appears above item image. This is for better understanding when displaying all news from all feeds. - load.php renamed to read_db.php
